item.title: Prep & Review
item.author: isaaczhou85@gmail.com (Isaac Zhou)
item.description: First, let’s review how to create single chart. We’ll use unemployment data from US Bureau of Labor Statistics. Here are the steps Use pandas to load a csv file to a DataFrame Use Pandas.to_datetime to convert the DATE column into a Series of datetime values Create a line chart that visualize the unemployment from 1948: x-values should be the first 12 values in the DATE column y-values should be the first 12 values in the VALUE column Formatting the chart use pyplot.
